name: Ghost Revengers
description:
you been chosen to do the impossible defend planet earth from ghost invasion? with a laser gun in hand try and defend the earth as long as you can to stop the ghost from destroying the earth GOOD LUCK!  

if you want to start off easy I recommend Richmond mode

Blue Ghost 20 Points

normal Ghost 30 Point

Green Ghost 40 Points 

Red Ghost 60 Points

WASD OR THE ARROWS KEYS TO MOVE 

SPACE BAR OR LEFT MOUSE TO SHOOT 

leave some feedback and what was you highest score

updates will be coming soon until final release
